tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Abortion / Medical Termination of Pregnancy (MTP),Nutrition for Pregnant Women,
review: Visited Dr Roopa for the first time for my first failed pregnancy for MTP and ever since she has guided us how to get pregnant for the second attempt and I have a son now. She was very patient and friendly in understanding all our problems and guide us throughout. Most importantly she is always available unlike other doctors whom you can not reach out to easily.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Roopa guided me throughout my pregnancy from the early weeks till delivery and post delivery as well. I am extremely grateful for her guidance and care as I hold my newborn baby girl in my arms today. Dr Roopa was always approachable and clarified all my queries to my satisfaction. She did timely scans and tests and helped me manage my pregnancy even when I started early labour in the last trimester. I delivered a full term baby girl with her support. I would recommend her with all my heart. Thank you ma'am.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I consulted her for infertility and pregnancy checkups for my wife.I felt her like my family doctor and very patient friendly. I consulted for infertility where she diagnosed well and given treatment such that i got conceived soon and also continued with her for pregnency checkups. She listens to us very keenly and explains each and everything with great patience even if it is a small or big doubt. Overall, I am very much satisfied with her way of understanding the problem, approach and the treatment.

tags: None
review: Roopa was a cool, approachable doctor who is a professional at the same. We consulted the doctor from the confirmation until 9 months of pregnancy. She patiently answers all the questions and understands the patient very well before suggesting any diagnostics. We would recommend her without any hesitation.

tags: None
review: I am very much happy that i got to know about Dr Roopa, her consultation is excellent.  I feel so relaxed after meeting her. Also she explains the problem and the solution thoroughly. I would definitely recommend her if you wish to have safe and happy pregnancy

tags: None
review:
Dr. Roopa is "the coolest" doctor I have ever met. She gives ample time to the patient to make her fell comfortable and understand her medical/pregnancy issues. She takes care of each and every aspect of her patient's medical issues. I will definitely recommend her.
-Sachin and Rekha

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: We made the right decission when we decided Dr roopa as per gynac for my pregnancy. She was an absolute delight . Her treatment, calmness ,always smiling attitude , explaining things very well all made my journey so easy .she was proactive around my treatment and ensured every step possible to make the delivery smooth . Highly recommended as I feel for this journey one needs a doctor who is very much approachable and she is one .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am chinmayee, I got married on dec 2018 but till march 2020 I did not conceive so I met dr Roopa,she gave me small advice and I followed that after 1 month only I got result.So I will give thank to doctor for her suggestions and support and save a lot of money for testing.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We are really thankful and happy with the  consulting & delivery experience with Dr.Roopa. I would highly recommend Dr.Roopa to all, as I felt so comfortable and safe during delivery even it was c-section. She's is so friendly , good listener and willingness to explain and clarify all our doubts. She always welcomes us with a pleasant smile which will gives us confidence. .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: It was a nice consulting experience with the Dr. Roopa Sibi Sekhar. She listened our queries with all patience, and then explained us very nicely and clarified all our doubts. She is very polite, friendly and approachable. The waiting time to meet the doctor is also very minimum, and not like others where We had to wait for almost two to three hours. The supporting staffs and nurses available at clinic are also very helpful and proactive.... Thanks to the Dr. and the supporting staffs.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Obstetrics Problems,
review: I found Dr. Roopa in practo,she is a very good doctor .she used to clear all my doubts even if it is a silly one. She had taken a good care of my pre and post delivery. She is very friendly and always smiling face.you will feel comfortable during your all sessions.without hesitating ask your all doubts.The best part of her treatment is she will not prescribe unnecessary medicines which other doctors do.Hope my feedback will be helpful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Roopa is most friendly doctor I have seen.she will try to understand our problem and try to solve. She will never imposed for any surgery. In my case I had cyst in overy for which I had irregular periods and latter on suffered for conceiving. Dr Roopa helped me not only by medicine even mentally.she tried to cure my problem with medicine but since my body was not responding to medicine she asked me for surgery which was minor. And after few months of surgery I conceive and now I am mother of a healthy baby girl. I will be always grateful to Dr Roopa and assured clinic team for helping me and being so friendly through out my journey.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
Hello Guys,

It is my pleasure to explain about my wife delivery checkup.
During our 6th month pregnancy she fell into Dengue and it was very tough situation. Though Roopa madam give lot of confidence and she helped us to admit the hospital on time. It was very tough time and she helped us lot during important decisions.

Now my wife is end of 9th Month we are expecting a baby :)

Roopa has lot of experience and my wife is doing very well

Thanks,
Anand
You can reach me if you need more details************

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Dr. Roopa was nice and listened to the problem very well and also provided her inputs about the treatment.
But the only problem I faced was that the doctor prescribed some blood tests to be done and the clinic was almost forcing me to take the test then and there. 
Although the tests that were prescribed are ideally done on the 2nd day of menstruation and also with 8-9 hours fasting, the doctor told them to take the sample at that time,  **** ** **** **** ***** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I have visited Dr. Roopa for my pregnancy. I was very satisfied with her friendlyness  and her detailed explanation. she never writes any extra or un necessary medical tests and medicines. she just suggests more natural alternatives. she was very patiently waited and helped me at my labour. I totally trust her and recommend her.Thank.you Dr. roopa

I highly recommend her and will continue to consult her in the future.
